mapper.select:
SELECT jm.* FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_JM] jm join [dbo].[ZHSQ_LD] ld on jm.LDID=ld.LDID
and jm.JMID = #{jmid}

SELECT id,imei,heartRate,dbp,sdp,oxygen,bloodSugar,temperature,createDate FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] b WHERE imei = '356201199014211' AND type = 'health' AND createDate = (SELECT MAX(createDate) as sj FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] c WHERE c.imei = b.imei AND type = 'health')

SELECT lat,lon,createDate FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] b WHERE imei = '356201199014211' AND type = 'location' AND createDate = (SELECT MAX(createDate) as sj FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] c WHERE c.imei = b.imei AND type = 'location')

SELECT battery,pedometer,jtmBattery ,createDate FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] b WHERE imei = '356201199014211' AND type = 'beatHeart' AND createDate = (SELECT MAX(createDate) as sj FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] c WHERE c.imei = b.imei AND type = 'beatHeart')
SELECT content,type,lat,lon,warningType,createDate FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] WHERE type = 'warning' AND createDate = (SELECT MAX(createDate) FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_ZNSB] WHERE type = 'warning' )

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_YC]
and YCID = #{ycid}

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_WYXC]
and WYXCID = #{wyxcid}

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_WYXCGJ]
and WYXCID = #{wyxcid}

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_FW]
and LDID = #{ldid}
